accessories.name: Auditorium Horizontal Main Curtain
accessories.description: Auditorium Curtains provides an extensive collection of Horizontal/Main motorized curtains system to our customers. The complete automatically motorized Stage curtains system with additional modified Gearbox fitted with sealed bearings self-lubricating center split overlapped curtains.

features.title: System
features.text: Complete automatically motorized Stage curtains system with additional modified Gearbox.

features.title: Fabric
features.text: Double gathering Velvet Fabric Curtain cloth drapery, 450 GSM.

features.title: Operation
features.text: Motorized operation complete with runners, master runners, pullies, 3mm steel wire rope, 1 HP Motor.

control_system: All rollers are sliding with roller clamp
curtain_details: Double gathering Velvet Fabric Curtain cloth drapery
operation: The curtain should be half of full width operated from control panel

accessories.name: Auditorium Horizontal Back Curtain
accessories.description: Auditorium Curtains provides an extensive collection of Horizontal/Back motorized curtains system to our customers. The complete automatically motorized Stage curtains system with additional modified Gearbox fitted with sealed bearings self-lubricating center split overlapped curtains.

features.title: System
features.text: Complete automatically motorized Stage curtains system with additional modified Gearbox.

features.title: Fabric
features.text: Double gathering Glazed Cotton Curtain cloth drapery, 350 GSM.

features.title: Operation
features.text: Motorized operation complete with runners, master runners, pullies, 3mm steel wire rope, 1 HP Motor.

control_system: All rollers are sliding with roller clamp
curtain_details: Double gathering Glazed Cotton Curtain cloth drapery
operation: The curtain should be half of full width operated from control panel

accessories.name: Auditorium Frill
accessories.description: Auditorium Curtains provide an extensive collection of Frills to our customers. Our offered Frills is designed and manufactured for School, College, Auditorium & Drama Theaters as well as Cinema Theaters.

features.title: Application
features.text: School, College, Auditorium & Drama Theaters, Cinema Theaters.

features.title: Design
features.text: Designed using modern technology and premium grade components.

application: Designed and manufactured for School, College, Auditorium & Drama Theaters
manufacturing: Made from premium grade components by skilled professionals
pricing: Clients can avail this system at most economical price

accessories.name: Auditorium Side Wings
accessories.description: Stage Wings also known as Leg Curtain or Wing Curtains. Stage Wings are narrow and tall, used to hide the side of the stage from the audience's view. They also provide masked wings for actors to enter and exit the stage.

features.title: Function
features.text: Hide the side of the stage and provide masked wings for actors to enter and exit.

features.title: Acoustics
features.text: Help to mask speaker systems, reduce echoing, and increase noise absorption.

features.title: Sound Distribution
features.text: Serve the purpose of distributing sound evenly towards the entire audience.

primary_purpose: Hide side of the stage from audience's view
Provide masked wings for actors to enter and exit
Separate different sections of the stage
Provide an extra space for a new scene
design_features: Usually flat panels, but can also be curved or wavy
Some come with borders and skirts while others blend into curtains
acoustic_properties: Differentiate between front-stage mid-stage and backstage
Mask the speaker system, panels and sidelights
Reduce echoing and increase noise absorption
Distribute sound evenly towards the entire audience
Designed to bounce the sound back to the audience
utility: Indispensable in masking out behind the scenes happening
Blackouts and backdrops can also be stored beside the wings

accessories.name: Auditorium Cyclorama Screen
accessories.description: A cyclorama, also known as 'cyc', is the largest single piece of landscape in the theatre. Cyclorama Screen is elevated along the stage rear wall at a distance of approx. 2000 mm.

features.title: Material
features.text: A heavy flame retardant fabric is stretched tightly to make a flat and smooth surface.

features.title: Function
features.text: Used to create illusionary effects with the help of light, colour and other props.

features.title: Application
features.text: Extensively used in film studios, private studios, school halls, auditoriums, drama rooms, etc.

placement: Elevated along the stage rear wall at a distance of approx. 2000 mm
material: Stretched tightly to make a flat and smooth surface
lighting_effects: Used to create illusionary effects with light, colour and other props
Can be front lit and back lit, depending on the material and conjunction with scrims
common_uses: Commonly found in operas and dances that require sky-like appeal
Versatile uses from providing extra effects to full display panel
Can be installed to create an illusion of infinity room
Trims also create a skirting and a larger background to the main cyc wall
form_factors: Come in different shapes, sizes, colours and fabric
Straight screens have been a popular choice for their convenience and versatility

accessories.name: Stage Light Bar
accessories.description: Stage Light Bar is a series of multiple lamps or LED's arranged in a line. This lighting fixture is used to provide a broad wash of light on a stage, backdrop, or cyclorama. Available as conventional fixtures (using halogen lamps) or, more commonly, as LED fixtures which allow for rich color mixing and dynamic effects.

features.title: Function
features.text: Used to provide a broad wash of light on a stage, backdrop, or cyclorama.

features.title: Types
features.text: Available as conventional halogen fixtures or modern LED fixtures.

features.title: Control
features.text: Often DMX controllable, allowing for color mixing (in LED models) and intensity control.

light_source: Often high-power LEDs (RGB, RGBW, or single color)
physical_construction: Mounting brackets for floor or truss

accessories.name: Auditorium Motorized Light Bar
accessories.description: An electrical pilewind winch mounted within the truss, featuring multiple drop pulleys for quick and easy raising/lowering of lighting bars, scenery backdrops, or similar suspensions. Known for durability, corrosion resistance, dimensional accuracy, and elegant design. Suitable for auditoriums, theatres, and schools due to its compact and modular nature.

features.title: Mechanism
features.text: Electrical pilewind winch with drop pulleys integrated within the truss structure.

features.title: Operation
features.text: Fully motor-controlled via hoist and gearbox, adhering to safety standards.

features.title: Suitability
features.text: Ideal for auditoriums, theatres, schools due to compact, modular design.

features.title: Integration
features.text: Fits into network of grid and sky deck for efficient management and noiseless operation.

control: Controlled by crew via single console
Know maximum load limit to avoid disasters
installation: Fitted into network of grid and sky deck
Minimises burden of trolleys, pulleys, heavy cable and machinery
Can be implanted into the wall

accessories.name: DMX Cable
accessories.description: A DMX cable is a shielded, low-capacitance cable designed specifically for the DMX512 lighting control protocol. It typically uses 3-pin or 5-pin XLR connectors and is essential for reliable, interference-free data transmission between controllers and fixtures.

features.title: Impedance
features.text: True 110-ohm impedance, required for reliable DMX data transmission.

features.title: Connectors
features.text: Available with 3-pin or 5-pin XLR male-to-female connectors.

features.title: Shielding
features.text: Heavy-duty shielding to prevent interference from power cables and other signals.

accessories.name: Auditorium Stage Side Ladder
accessories.description: A vertical ladder structure, often made of mild steel, used for mounting lighting fixtures on the sides of a stage. Can be pivoted or fixed.

features.title: Construction
features.text: Single construction with cross connecting pipes at intervals.

finish: Powder coated with matt black finish paint
technical_parameters: Combination: 600mm wide with Height Variable / Custom made sizes
Construction: Single construction with cross connecting pipes at every 600mm or custom made sizes
Additional: If pivoted on trolley, ladder can be moved along the track or adjusted as required

accessories.name: MCB Box (16way)
accessories.description: A distribution box designed to house Miniature Circuit Breakers (MCBs) for electrical circuit protection in stage lighting and other applications.

accessories.name: C Clamp (CCT008)
accessories.description: A C-shaped clamp made of iron, used for mounting lighting fixtures onto pipes or trusses.

accessories.name: Fixed Pipe Grid
accessories.description: A grid structure made of mild steel pipes, suspended via suspenders, used for overhead mounting of lighting fixtures and other stage equipment.

accessories.name: Fixed Lighting Bar (FLBT008)
accessories.description: A fixed bar made of mild steel pipe, suspended via suspenders, designed specifically for hanging lighting fixtures.

accessories.name: Stage Side Wings (SSWT006)
accessories.description: Frame structures made of mild steel square pipes, used to create stage wings. Can be pivoted or fixed.

finish: Powder coated with matt black paint
construction: Single & Dual of pipe as per design

accessories.name: Track Beam System (TBST003)
accessories.description: A track system made of aluminum, suspended via spud & trolley, allowing for fixed or manually moveable mounting points.

finish: Powder coated with matt black paint

accessories.name: Drapery (DRPT003)
accessories.description: Valance or Scallop beautifying cloth arrangement at the front of the Stage just before the Apron area. Extensively used for theatre stage systems to provide a grand look and hide lighting bars.

features.title: Placement
features.text: Front of Stage, before Apron area.

description: Valance or Scallop is the beautifying cloth arrangement at the front of the Stage just before the Apron area.
The straight cloth finish at the bottom of the fabric is named Valance.
Half circled finish at the bottom is named as Scallop of Main Frill.
usage: Extensively used for theatre stage systems.
Provide a grand look to the stage.
Hide lighting bars from audience view.

accessories.name: 1500W Smoke Machine (SMT015)
accessories.description: A 1500W smoke machine for creating atmospheric effects on stage.
